mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Ponsonby, John
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Is sending proofs of invention of Messrs. Ackermann, Suardy & Co. of London for making woolen cloth, linen, paper and waterproof, together with publication on the subject. [See document from Prince of Wales to Ackermann, Suardy and Company, April 24, 1801.]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1802 June 26, Sysonby near Petersburg, [Virginia] to Tho[ma]s Jefferson, n.p.
